item.title: Waymo suspends service in San Francisco as robotaxis stall during blackout
item.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

item.title: As EU waters down 2035 EV goals, electric startups express concern
item.description: The future may be electric, but that future is being postponed. The European Commission, citing the need for flexibility, has softened its ambitious p...

item.title: Israel’s famed VC Jon Medved, diagnosed with ALS, backed the tech that will improve his life
item.description: In perhaps the last public interview of one Israel's most famous VCs, Jon Medved tells TechCrunch how tech will enhance his life.

item.title: 5 Best Monitors for the Mac Mini (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The Mac Mini is a fantastic little computer, but you'll need one of these great monitors to complete the setup.

item.title: Research Reveals the Optimal Way to Optimize
item.description: The leading approach to the simplex method, a widely used technique for balancing complex logistical constraints, can’t get any better.
